backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing building management system with user profiles, buildings, apartments, announcements, and invite codes. Includes role-based access control (binaSahibi, yetkili, sakin) and authorization mixins with security checks preventing users from creating multiple buildings.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented features for apartment layout visualization: DaireGorunumu component creation, integration into OwnerDashboard, occupancy status indicators, and hover interactions with tooltips.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of frontend files including routing, authentication, role-based dashboards, user management, invite code handling, and UI components with Turkish localization.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind directives defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark themes, including sidebar, chart, and semantic color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with Turkish title 'Bina Yönetim ERP Uygulaması' and root div mounting the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application with TanStack Router, Internet Identity authentication, role-based routing logic that redirects authenticated users to appropriate dashboards (owner/manager/resident) based on UserProfile role, and protected route handling.
frontend/src/components/AnnouncementCrea: Form component for creating announcements with title (baslik) and description (aciklama) fields, validation, loading states, and success/error toast notifications using shadcn/ui components.
frontend/src/components/AnnouncementsLis: Displays a list of announcements with loading, error, and empty states. Shows announcement title, description, creation date, and creator principal in card format.
frontend/src/components/ApartmentCreateF: Form component for creating new apartments with a name/number input field. Handles form submission, validation, and displays success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/ApartmentsList.t: Displays all apartments in a table format showing apartment name and creation date. Includes loading skeleton, error handling, and empty state.
frontend/src/components/BuildingCreateFo: Form component for creating a new building with name input. Handles validation, submission with loading state, and success callback.
frontend/src/components/BuildingUsersLis: Displays a table of all building users showing their principal, name, role badge, and assigned apartment. Includes loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/DaireGorunumu.ts: Grid view of apartments showing occupancy status with hover cards. Displays apartment details, occupant information, and creation date in a visual card layout.
Manages invite code creation and display based on user role permissions. Shows existing codes with copy functionality and allows creating new codes for specific roles.
frontend/src/components/InviteCodeRegist: React component for registering with a 16-character alphanumeric invite code, with validation, role-based messaging, and mutation handling for joining a building.
frontend/src/components/IssuesList.tsx: Displays a table of open issues/maintenance requests with apartment, reporter, status, and creation date information, including loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout wrapper component that renders navigation, page content via Outlet, and a footer with branding and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Role-based navigation component with desktop and mobile menus, filtering menu items by user role (binaSahibi, yetkili, sakin) and handling authentication/logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with identity authentication, admin token initialization, and automatic query invalidation on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for backend operations including user profiles, buildings, invite codes, apartments, announcements, and issues with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for theming (light/dark modes), including color schemes for UI components, sidebar, charts, and design tokens like radius and borders.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication context.
frontend/src/pages/Announcements.tsx: Announcements page allowing building owners and authorities to create and view building announcements with priority levels; includes mock data and role-based access control.
frontend/src/pages/BuildingMembers.tsx: Displays building members list derived from invite codes, showing member statistics by role (owner, authority, resident) with role-based visibility controls.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: User dashboard showing welcome message, login status, first-time login detection, and principal ID display with loading states.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Main home page with role-based content rendering, building statistics, invite code management, and onboarding flow handling for different user types (building owner, authority, resident).
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Login page with three user type options (building owner, authority, resident), each triggering Internet Identity authentication with stored onboarding flow context.
frontend/src/pages/ManagerDashboard.tsx: Dashboard page for manager (yetkili) role displaying building overview, active invite codes statistics, and an issues list component with loading states and role badges.
frontend/src/pages/OwnerDashboard.tsx: Comprehensive dashboard for building owner (bina sahibi) role with statistics cards, invite code management, building users list, apartment management, announcements, and apartment view components.
frontend/src/pages/Profile.tsx: User profile page displaying Internet Identity principal ID, authentication details, account status, and user role information with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentDashboard.tsx: Dashboard for resident (sakin) role showing building information, announcements access, and issue reporting features with simplified permissions.
frontend/src/pages/UserDetail.tsx: Empty file placeholder for user detail page functionality.
frontend/src/pages/Users.tsx: Users list page with table structure and alert indicating the feature is under development pending backend implementation of getAllUserProfiles endpoint.
frontend/src/utils/roleTranslations.ts: Utility functions to translate Role enum values to Turkish display names and map roles to badge variants (default, secondary, outline).
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration for parameter persistence across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, typography, container queries, animations, and sidebar-specific styling for the application.
project_state.json: Project state document defining a multi-tenant building management ERP system with Internet Identity authentication, role-based access, and phased development strategy including user management, invitation codes, and ERP modules.
